dcterms:creator: Jort F Gemmeke
Daniel PW Ellis
Dylan Freedman
Aren Jansen
Wade Lawrence
R Channing Moore
Manoj Plakal
Marvin Ritter
dcterms:description: AudioSet-2M comprises approximately 2 million 10-second audio clips that are utilized for audio classification purposes. Each clip is weakly annotated for 527 types of audio events.
dcterms:title: AudioSet-2M

dcterms:creator: Juncheng B. Li
Shuhui Qu
Po-Yao Huang
Florian Metze
dcterms:description: AudioSet-20K is a subset of AudioSet designed for audio classification, consisting of a balanced set of audio clips.
dcterms:title: AudioSet-20K

dcterms:creator: Karol J. Piczak
dcterms:description: ESC-50 is a collection of 2,000 environmental sound recordings for audio classification, each lasting 5 seconds and categorized into 50 classes.
dcterms:title: Environmental Sound Classification (ESC-50)

dcterms:creator: P. Warden
dcterms:description: Speech Commands (SPC-1 and SPC-2) are datasets for limited-vocabulary speech recognition, with SPC-2 containing 35 speech commands.
dcterms:title: Speech Commands (SPC-1 and SPC-2)

dcterms:creator: Arsha Nagrani
Joon Son Chung
Weidi Xie
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: VoxCeleb is a large-scale speaker verification dataset comprising 150K utterances attributed to 1,251 distinct speakers.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb (SID)
